feed.title: Dockcheck Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.5.1
entry.content:
New:

  • Podman fork created: sudo-kraken/podcheck
  • Rewrite of container metadata extraction - Requires dependency jq

Fixes:

  • Improvements and formatting upstreamed from sudo-kraken/podcheck

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.5.2.1
entry.content:
New:

  • Rewritten dependency downloaders (to make it generic)
  • jq installer added. Will prompt user to install via package manager or static binary.

Fixes:

  • v0.5.2 -> v0.5.2.1 was a hotfix to fix a breaking typo.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.5.1...v0.5.2.1

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.5.3.0
entry.content:
Fixes:

  • Changed local image check logic.
  • Containers were falsely showing as up to date after new image was downloaded elsewhere (eg. watchtower).
  • Thank you @kennywasafk for troubleshooting.
  • Removed whale-icon from Gotify-template and corrected output redirection to show errors.
  • Thank you @eapetitfils for spotting it.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.5.2.1...v0.5.3.0

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.5.4.0
entry.content:
New:

  • Added an export for node_exporter's text file collector to provide metrics to Prometheus by @tdralle in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/121
  • Finalized Prometheus addon by @mag37 in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/124

New Contributors:

  • @tdralle in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/121 - Thank you for the contribution and testing!

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.5.3.0...v0.5.4.0

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.5.5.0
entry.content:
Fixes:

  • Compatibility with osx + bsd added and tested in PR #130
    • Rewritten dependency installer (jq + regctl) to a function instead of separate sections.

Big thanks to @pshannon-git for bringing issues to light and helping me test the builds.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.5.4.0...v0.5.5.0
